name: FFAuction Draft Tool
description: Draft day tool for value-based drafting

NODE_ENV.description: Set the `NODE_ENV` environment variable to `production` to disable debugging etc.

NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: By default heroku is not installing `devDependencies`, so let's do that.

AUTH_USERNAME.description: Username for authorization for protected endpoints (CSV upload)

AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Password for authorization for protected endpoints (CSV upload)
